fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: We are looking for a summary judgment for the entire judiciary, excluding the high court. You should consider judges on both ordinary courts and specialized courts.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: How often would you say the government complies with important decisions by other courts with which it disagrees?
fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2jucomp, *_osp, *_ord
